question:
India is to set up its first National Maritime Heritage Museum in Lothal. In this context, consider the following statements:
  1. Lothal is located near the Gulf of Kutch.
  2. Lothal was an Indus Valley Civilisation site.
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Statement 1 is incorrect: Lothal is located in Gujarat. It is located close to the Gulf of Khambat. The Indian government, in collaboration with Portugal, is to set up the country’s first National Maritime heritage Museum in Lothal. The museum will showcase artefacts and other material salvaged from shipwrecks in Indian Ocean. Statement 2 is correct:        Lothal is one of the sites of the ancient Indus valley Civilisation. It was a vital maritime trading centre during the Indus Valley Civilisation period. Archaeological Survey of India highlights it for housing one of the world’s first docks.
